changeSet.author: antti.leppa
changeSet.sql: UPDATE User SET subscriptionLevel = 'PREMIUM'

changeSet.author: antti.leppa
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO hibernate_sequences (sequence_name, sequence_next_hi_value) VALUES ('LocalizedValue', (SELECT max(id) FROM LocalizedValue) + 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE sequence_next_hi_value = VALUES(sequence_next_hi_value);
INSERT INTO hibernate_sequences (sequence_name, sequence_next_hi_value) VALUES ('LocalizedValue', (SELECT max(id) FROM LocalizedValue) + 1);

changeSet.author: antti.leppa
changeSet.sql: UPDATE hibernate_sequences SET sequence_next_hi_value = (SELECT max(id) FROM LocalizedValue) + 5 where sequence_name = 'LocalizedValue'

INSERT INTO hibernate_sequences (sequence_name, sequence_next_hi_value) VALUES ('LocalizedEntry', (SELECT max(id) FROM LocalizedEntry) + 3) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE sequence_next_hi_value = VALUES(sequence_next_hi_value)
UPDATE hibernate_sequences set sequence_next_hi_value = (SELECT max(id) + 3 FROM LocalizedEntry) where sequence_name = 'LocalizedEntry'
INSERT INTO LocalizedEntry (id) VALUES ((SELECT sequence_next_hi_value - 2 FROM hibernate_sequences WHERE sequence_name = 'LocalizedEntry'))
INSERT INTO LocalizedEntry (id) VALUES ((SELECT sequence_next_hi_value - 1 FROM hibernate_sequences WHERE sequence_name = 'LocalizedEntry'))

INSERT INTO LocalizedValue (id, entry_id, locale, text) VALUES ((SELECT sequence_next_hi_value - 4 FROM hibernate_sequences WHERE sequence_name = 'LocalizedValue'), (SELECT sequence_next_hi_value - 2 FROM hibernate_sequences WHERE sequence_name = 'LocalizedEntry'), 'fi', 'eDelphi tilauksesi on pttymss')

INSERT INTO LocalizedValue (id, entry_id, locale, text) VALUES ((SELECT sequence_next_hi_value - 3 FROM hibernate_sequences WHERE sequence_name = 'LocalizedValue'), (SELECT sequence_next_hi_value - 2 FROM hibernate_sequences WHERE sequence_name = 'LocalizedEntry'), 'en', 'eDelphi subscription is ending')

INSERT INTO LocalizedValue (id, entry_id, locale, text) VALUES ((SELECT sequence_next_hi_value - 2 FROM hibernate_sequences WHERE sequence_name = 'LocalizedValue'), (SELECT sequence_next_hi_value - 1 FROM hibernate_sequences WHERE sequence_name = 'LocalizedEntry'), 'fi', '

eDelphi {0} tilauksesi on pttymss {1} pivn kuluessa.

Mikli haluat jatkaa tilausta ole hyv ja ky jatkamassa tai muuttamassa tilaustasi osoitteessa: https://www.edelphi.org/changeplan.page

Tm on automaattinen viesti, l vastaa viestiin.

')

INSERT INTO LocalizedValue (id, entry_id, locale, text) VALUES ((SELECT sequence_next_hi_value - 1 FROM hibernate_sequences WHERE sequence_name = 'LocalizedValue'), (SELECT sequence_next_hi_value - 1 FROM hibernate_sequences WHERE sequence_name = 'LocalizedEntry'), 'en', '

Your eDelphi {0} subscription is ending in {1} days.

If you wish to continue using subscription level features navigate to following address to change or continue your subscription: https://www.edelphi.org/changeplan.page

This is an automated message, please do not reply.

')

INSERT INTO Notification (id, millisBefore, name, type, subjectTemplate_id, contentTemplate_id) VALUES (1, 604800000, 'Week before', 'SUBSCRIPTION_END', (SELECT sequence_next_hi_value - 2 FROM hibernate_sequences WHERE sequence_name = 'LocalizedEntry'), (SELECT sequence_next_hi_value - 1 FROM hibernate_sequences WHERE sequence_name = 'LocalizedEntry'))
INSERT INTO hibernate_sequences (sequence_name, sequence_next_hi_value) VALUES ('Notification', (SELECT max(id) FROM Notification) + 1)

changeSet.author: antti.leppa
changeSet.sql: UPDATE User SET locale = 'fi' WHERE id IN (SELECT user_id FROM UserEmail WHERE address LIKE '%.fi')

changeSet.author: antti.leppa
antti.leppa
changeSet.sql: UPDATE queryquestioncomment c, queryquestioncomment p SET c.category_id = p.category_id WHERE c.parentComment_id = p.id
UPDATE queryquestioncomment c, queryquestioncomment p SET c.category_id = p.category_id WHERE c.parentComment_id = p.id
UPDATE queryquestioncomment c, queryquestioncomment p SET c.category_id = p.category_id WHERE c.parentComment_id = p.id
UPDATE queryquestioncomment c, queryquestioncomment p SET c.category_id = p.category_id WHERE c.parentComment_id = p.id
UPDATE queryquestioncomment c, queryquestioncomment p SET c.category_id = p.category_id WHERE c.parentComment_id = p.id

changeSet.author: antti.leppa
changeSet.sql: UPDATE QueryQuestionCommentCategory c, QuerySection qs, QueryPage qp SET c.query_id = qs.query_id WHERE qp.id = c.queryPage_id AND qs.id = qp.querySection_id

changeSet.author: antti.leppa
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO PanelInvitation (panel_id, email, hash, role_id, state, archived, creator_id, created, lastModifier_id, lastModified) SELECT pu.panel_id, (SELECT address from UserEmail where user_id = pu.user_id LIMIT 1), uuid(), pu.role_id, 'ADDED', false, pu.creator_id, pu.created, pu.lastModifier_id, pu.lastModified FROM PanelUser pu INNER JOIN Panel p ON p.id = pu.panel_id WHERE pu.joinType = 'ADDED' AND pu.archived = false AND pu.stamp_id = p.currentStamp_id AND (SELECT address from UserEmail where user_id = pu.user_id LIMIT 1) IS NOT NULL

changeSet.author: antti.leppa
changeSet.sql: UPDATE LocalizedValue SET text = 'Time Series' WHERE entry_id = (SELECT name_id FROM QueryPageTemplate WHERE iconName = 'timeserie') AND locale = 'en'
